description: Translate text in images using Qwen Multi-modal Translation API with URL-based and file-based workflows for seamless integration.
poll-the-qwen-mt-image-service-for-trans: Poll the Qwen MT Image service for translation results using the task ID. Automatically retries until the task is complete or max retries is reached
the-task-id-returned-from-the-submit-req: The task ID returned from the submit request
seconds-to-wait-between-polling-attempts: Seconds to wait between polling attempts
final-status-of-the-translation-task: Final status of the translation task
submit-an-image-translation-request-to-t: Submit an image translation request to the Qwen MT Image service and receive a task ID for result polling
the-url-of-the-image-to-be-translated: The URL of the image to be translated
the-task-id-for-polling-the-translation-: The task ID for polling the translation result
translate-text-in-a-local-image-file-fro: Translate text in a local image file from source to target language and save the result.
the-url-of-the-image-to-be-translated2: The URL of the image to be translated
path-of-the-successfully-downloaded-file: Path of the successfully downloaded file
translate-text-in-an-image-url-from-sour: Translate text in an image URL from source to target language and return the translated image URL.
the-url-of-the-image-to-be-translated3: The URL of the image to be translated
description2: Translate text in images using Qwen Multi-modal Translation API with URL-based and file-based workflows for seamless integration.
